com.vsegouin.mowitnow.controllers

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vsegouin.mowitnow.controllers.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MowerController

    public class MainController
extends Object
implements MowerController
    The main controller which will keep the program coherent and do the differents actions on the mowers. It's the main interface with the different UI Created by v.segouin on 11/09/2016.

      Basic private constructor, instantiation a new Hashmap which will contains mowers data.

      • fetchMowerFromCoordinates

        public Mower fetchMowerFromCoordinates(MapArea map,
                                       int x,
                                       int y)
        Will check the mower's state and will return the mower located at the 'x','y' position.
        Specified by:
        fetchMowerFromCoordinates in interface MowerController
        Parameters:
        x - the abscissa where the mower is supposed to be
        y - the ordinate where the mower is supposed to be
        map - the map where to find the mower
        Returns:
        the mower located at x,y, will return null if there is no mower.
